data.message: i dont see how you fucking live with your godamn self dude this aint right i took the two steps forward an idk any more i got murdered dude my life hasnt got any better i write allot of music for alot of people idk anymore im a pasifist buuuuuuutttttt on the other hand you hate it when i laugh yo wheres the birds at slimshady recognize cool calm i like football hut on hut to reach around and reach into another grown mans but lol totally a fan man im not anymore
